outputs.output_descr:
The outputs associated with this project are:-
Output 1. Establishment of a Monitoring, Evaluation and Reporting Mechanism.
Output 2. Enforcement of the Licensing Systems and Prevention of Illegal Trade.
Output 3. Training and Certification of Technicians and Establisment  of an Association of Refrigeration Tecnicians. 
Output 3. Provision of Equipment and Retrofit Demonstration.

project_descr: TERMINAL PHASE-OUT MANAGEMENT PLAN FOR CHLORO FLUORO CARBONS IN DOMINICA
